tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE communication_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sender VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    receiver VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    message TEXT NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE communication_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    sender VARCHAR(50),
    recipient VARCHAR(50),
    message TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE astronauts (
    astronaut_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    astronaut_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    nationality TEXT,
    age INT,
    mission_id INT,
);

CREATE TABLE communication_logs (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    mission_id INT,
    astronaut_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    message TEXT,
);

CREATE TABLE MissionControlCommunicationLogs (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    mission_id INT,
    astronaut_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    message TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Astronauts (
    astronaut_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    nationality VARCHAR(50),
    job_title VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE MissionControl (
    mission_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    mission_name VARCHAR(50),
    destination VARCHAR(50),
    launch_date DATE,
    arrival_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE AstronautTraining (
    training_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    astronaut_id INT,
    training_type VARCHAR(50),
    training_date DATE,
    training_duration INT
);

CREATE TABLE MissionStatus (
    status_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    mission_id INT,
    status VARCHAR(50),
    details TEXT,
    update_time TIMESTAMP
);
